funconf - Function Configuration

funconf - Function Configuration¶

funconf simplifies the management of keyword argument default values by seamlessly integrating configuration files into mapping objects which can decorate a function to set or override its default values.

Project support:

  • source code hosted at github.com.
  • distributed through PyPI.
  • documentation hosted at readthedocs.org.

[mjdorma+funconf@gmail.com]
